name: hulu
tag_list: hulu, video, embeddable, professional, content, black, lost, heroes, simpsons, office, tv, movies
overview:
Founded in March 2007, Hulu is operated independently by a dedicated management team with offices in Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, Seattle and Beijing. NBC Universal, News Corporation, as of April 2009, Disney, Providence Equity Partners and the Hulu team share in the ownership stake of the company.

Hulu is an online video service that offers a selection of hit shows, clips, movies and more at Hulu.com, numerous destination sites online, and through the ad-supported subscription service, Hulu Plus.

Hulu brings together a selection of videos from over 260 content companies, including FOX, NBCUniversal, ABC, Criterion, A&E Networks, Lionsgate, Endemol, MGM, MTV Networks, Comedy Central, National Geographic, Digital Rights Group, Paramount, Sony Pictures, Warner Bros., TED, etc. Hulu also offers a wide array of acclaimed movies and documentaries.

The site focuses exclusively on professional video content and does not take on YouTube directly as a viral video destination.

Hulu videos are played in their own embeddable branded player. Content from at least a dozen TV networks and two major film studios is promised. Initial distribution partners include AOL, Comcast, MSN, MySpace and Yahoo.

Jason Kilar, Hulu’s CEO, explains the meaning of Hulu’s name, “Objectively, Hulu is short, easy to spell, easy to pronounce, and rhymes with itself. Subjectively, Hulu strikes us as an inherently fun name, one that captures the spirit of the service we’re building.” However, some aren’t so sure it was the wisest name to pick.

In September 2007 that Hulu acquired Bejing-based startup Mojiti and used its platform for the basis of the product.

Hulu gives advertisers an opportunity to associate their brands with its online video content. And, through the Hulu Plus subscription service, advertisers can extend their reach to the users of Hulu Plus enabled devices on market today.

Some question whether the owners of Hulu are gutting the service to make room for more advertisements.

relationships.title: SVP of Content Acquisition and Distribution

milestones.description: Hulu Refreshes HD Gallery with Diverse Selection of Full Hit Episodes
Hulu Tops 100 Content Providers, Launches New Features to Enhance Discoverability
milestones.source_text:
At Hulu, weâ€™ve been working fast and furiously to provide people with
the worldâ€™s premium content. Today, just six months after Huluâ€™s public
launch, Hulu has doubled its list of show and movie titles as well as
its content providers. With a content library nearing 900 titles from
more than 100 content providers, Huluâ€™s content aggregation model has
continued to resonate with users. In the month of August, Nielsenâ€™s
VideoCensus reported that Hulu delivered nearly 108 million video
streams, ranking Hulu as the overall No. 8 brand based on video streams.

To accommodate a continuously growing content library, Hulu has also
improved discoverability on the service. Hulu.com today implemented a
number of features including genre-based browsing, show recommendations,
user discussion forums for specific programs or episodes, enhanced
actor-based searching and improved queue management.

Genre-based channels allow users to more easily find their favorites and
discover new ones. To start, the site will debut 17 channels, including
Action and Adventure, Comedy, Horror and Suspense, News and Information
and Reality and Game Shows. A few other notable channels include:

Â· *_Anime_* â€“ This channel launches with popular shows /Naruto/, /Death
Note/ and /Mushi-Shi/. In the coming weeks, Hulu will also debut /Ikki
Tousen/ and a number of other cult favorites like /Bleach/, /Basilisk,/
/Black Blood Brothers/, /Kiddy Grade/, /Moon Phase/, /Peach Girl/ and
/School Rumble/.

Â· *_Fashion and Beauty_* â€“ This channel features popular videos from the
world of fashion, including Vogue.TVâ€™s most noteworthy new series
/Model.Live/ and shows like /Behind the Lens/ and /60 Seconds to Chic/.
The channel also features new videos from Fashion Week 2008 and videos
for all fitness levels from Exercise TV.

Â· *_Food and Leisure_ *â€“ This channel features many new shows from the
Food Network, including /30 Minute Meals/, /Everyday Italian/, /Simply
Delicioso /and/ Ace of Cakes/; and /Cool Kid Parties/ and /Any Given
Latitude/ from Fine Living. Additionally, the channel will also feature
new content providers: Australian Food TV, Howcast, and HandmadeTV.

Â· *_Home and Garden_ *â€“ This channel includes a number of new shows,
including /Curb Appeal/ and /House Hunters/ from HGTV and /Man Caves/
from DIY Network.

Â· *_Web Originals_* â€“ This channel is solely dedicated to premium Web
originals and made-for-web videos, including the highly anticipated
/LG15: The Resistance/ from the producers of /Lonely Girl/, as well as
/The Line/ from /Saturday Night Live/ actor and writer Seth Meyers,
/Coma/ starring Michael Madsen, /Carpet Brothers/ starring Tim Meadows
and David Spade, and /Gemini Division/ with Rosario Dawson.

milestones.description: Projected 2010 revenues up from $240M to $260M due to uptake in subscription revenues by subscribers at $8 per month. 2009 revenue was $108m and 2008 $25m
